00039 PrimaryGeneratorAction* PrimaryGeneratorAction::fPrimaryGeneratorAction = 0;
00040 
00041 PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()
00042         : MyConfigure(),
00043         root_index(0),
00044         m_TChain(0),
00045         particleGun(0),  //pointer a to G4  class
00046         gunMessenger(0),   //messenger of this class
00047         fParticle(0),
00048         fp(0)
00049 {
00050         if (fPrimaryGeneratorAction){
00051                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00052                                 FatalException, "PrimaryGeneratorAction constructed twice.");
00053         }
00054         fPrimaryGeneratorAction = this;
00055         //create a messenger for this class
00056         gunMessenger = new PrimaryGeneratorMessenger(this);
00057 
00058         // default particle kinematic
00059         G4String file_name = getenv("GENFILEROOT");
00060         ReadCard(file_name);
00061         Initialize();
00062 }
00063 
00064 PrimaryGeneratorAction::~PrimaryGeneratorAction()
00065 {
00066         delete particleGun;
00067         delete gunMessenger;
00068         delete EM_hist;
00069         delete DM_hist;
00070         delete m_TChain;
00071 }

00073 PrimaryGeneratorAction* PrimaryGeneratorAction::GetPrimaryGeneratorAction(){
00074         if ( !fPrimaryGeneratorAction ){
00075                 new PrimaryGeneratorAction();
00076         }
00077         return fPrimaryGeneratorAction;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void* PrimaryGeneratorAction::get_extra(G4String name){
00081         if (name=="weight") {if(!flag_weight)  return &root_double[9];}
00082         else if (name=="ox") {if(!flag_ox)  return &root_double[10];}
00083         else if (name=="oy") {if(!flag_oy)  return &root_double[11];}
00084         else if (name=="oz") {if(!flag_oz)  return &root_double[12];}
00085         else if (name=="opx") {if(!flag_opx)  return &root_double[13];}
00086         else if (name=="opy") {if(!flag_opy)  return &root_double[14];}
00087         else if (name=="opz") {if(!flag_opz)  return &root_double[15];}
00088         else if (name=="ot") {if(!flag_ot)  return &root_double[16];}
00089         else if (name=="ppid") {if(!flag_ppid)  return &root_int[1];}
00090         else if (name=="ptid") {if(!flag_ptid)  return &root_int[2];}
00091         else if (name=="process") {if(!flag_process)  return root_str[0];}
00092         else if (name=="volume") {if(!flag_volume)  return root_str[1];}
00093 //      else if (name=="R0") {if(flag_R0)  return &root_double[7];}
00094 //      else if (name=="R1") {if(flag_R1)  return &root_double[8];}
00095         else if (name=="R0") {if(!flag_R0)  return &root_int[3];}
00096         else if (name=="R1") {if(!flag_R1)  return &root_int[4];}
00097         return NULL;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries(G4Event* anEvent)
00101 {
00102         //this function is called at the begining of event
00103         // 
00104         if (UseRoot){
00105                 root_get_para();
00106         }
00107         if (RandMode=="root"){
00108                 long seeds[3];
00109 //              seeds[0] = root_double[7];
00110 //              seeds[1] = root_double[8];
00111                 seeds[0] = root_int[3];
00112                 seeds[1] = root_int[4];
00113                 seeds[2] = 0;
00114 //              std::cout<<"setTheSeeds("<<(int)seeds[0]<<","<<(int)seeds[1]<<")"<<std::endl;
00115                 CLHEP::HepRandom::setTheSeeds(seeds);
00116         }
00117 
00118         // Show Status:
00119 //      std::cout<<"==>Event "<<root_index<<std::endl;
00120 //    CLHEP::HepRandom::showEngineStatus();
00121 
00122         EventHeaderSvc::GetEventHeaderSvc()->SetSeedsValue();
00123         EventHeaderSvc::GetEventHeaderSvc()->SetInitialMomentum(root_double[17],root_double[18],root_double[19]);
00124 
00125         if (fType=="ion"){
00126                 if (!fParticle){
00127                         G4ParticleTable* particleTable = G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable();
00128                         fParticle = particleTable->GetIon(Z,A,E*keV);
00129                         if (!fParticle){
00130                                 std::cout<<"ERROR: In PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction() Cannot find particle "
00131                                                  <<"Z = "<<Z
00132                                                  <<", A = "<<A
00133                                                  <<", E = "<<E<<" keV"
00134                                                  <<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00135                                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00136                                                 FatalException, "Cannot find particle.");
00137                         }
00138                 }
00139                 if (fType == "stable"){
00140                         fParticle->SetPDGStable(true);
00141                 }
00142                 particleGun->SetParticleDefinition(fParticle);
00143                 mass = particleGun->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGMass();
00144                 particleGun->SetParticleCharge(C*eplus);
00145         }
00146 
00147         if ( pidMode == "root"){
00148                 G4ParticleTable* particleTable = G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable();
00149                 G4ParticleDefinition* particle = particleTable->FindParticle(root_int[0]);
00150                 if (!particle){
00151                         std::cout<<"ERROR: In PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction() Cannot find particle "<<root_int[0]<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00152                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00153                                         FatalException, "Cannot find particle.");
00154                 }
00155                 if (fType == "stable"){
00156                         particle->SetPDGStable(true);
00157                 }
00158                 particleGun->SetParticleDefinition(particle);
00159                 mass = particleGun->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGMass();
00160         }
00161 
00162         if ( EnergyMode == "histo"){
00163                 G4double mom = EM_hist->GetRandom() * MeV;
00164                 G4double ekin = sqrt(mom*mom+mass*mass)-mass;
00165                 particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(ekin);
00166         }
00167         else if ( EnergyMode == "root" ){
00168                 //std::cout<<"PGA EM = root!"
00169                 //           <<", ("<<root_double[3]
00170                 //           <<","<<root_double[4]
00171                 //           <<","<<root_double[5]
00172                 //           <<") MeV"
00173                 //           <<std::endl;
00174                 G4double ekin = sqrt(root_double[3]*root_double[3]*MeV*MeV+root_double[4]*root_double[4]*MeV*MeV+root_double[5]*root_double[5]*MeV*MeV+mass*mass)-mass;
00175                 particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(G4ThreeVector(root_double[3] * MeV, root_double[4] * MeV, root_double[5] * MeV).unit());
00176                 particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(ekin);
00177         }
00178         else if ( EnergyMode == "gRand" || EnergyMode == "uRand" ){
00179                 SetRandomEnergy();
00180         }
00181         else if ( EnergyMode != "none" ){
00182                 std::cout<<"ERROR: unknown EnergyMode: "<<EnergyMode<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00183                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries()",
00184                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00185                                 "unknown EnergyMode");
00186         }
00187 
00188         if ( DirectionMode == "uniform" ){
00189                 SetUniformDirection();
00190         }
00191         else if ( DirectionMode == "histo" ){
00192                 G4double theta = DM_hist->GetRandom() * rad;
00193                 G4double phi = G4UniformRand() * 360. *deg;
00194                 G4ThreeVector dir_3Vec(1, 1, 1);
00195                 dir_3Vec.setTheta(theta);
00196                 dir_3Vec.setPhi(phi);
00197                 particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(dir_3Vec);
00198         }
00199         else if ( DirectionMode != "none" ){
00200                 std::cout<<"ERROR: unknown DirectionMode: "<<DirectionMode<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00201                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries()",
00202                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00203                                 "unknown DirectionMode");
00204         }
00205         if ( PhiMode== "gRand" || PhiMode=="uRand" || ThetaMode== "gRand" || ThetaMode=="uRand" ){
00206                 SetRandomDirection();
00207         }
00208 
00209         if ( PositionMode == "uniform" ){
00210                 SetUniformPosition();
00211         }
00212         else if ( PositionMode == "root" ){
00213                 //std::cout<<"PGA PM = root!"
00214                 //           <<", ("<<root_double[0]
00215                 //           <<","<<root_double[1]
00216                 //           <<","<<root_double[2]
00217                 //           <<") mm"
00218                 //           <<std::endl;
00219                 particleGun->SetParticlePosition(G4ThreeVector(root_double[0] * mm, root_double[1] * mm, (root_double[2])*mm));
00220         }
00221         else if ( PositionMode == "gRand" || PositionMode == "sRand" || PositionMode == "bRand" ){
00222                 SetRandomPosition();
00223         }
00224         else if ( PositionMode == "target") {
00225           SetRandomPosition();  
00226         }
00227         else if ( PositionMode == "source") {
00228           SetRandomPosition();  
00229         }
00230         else if ( PositionMode != "none" ){
00231                 std::cout<<"ERROR: unknown PositionMode: "<<PositionMode<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00232                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries()",
00233                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00234                                 "unknown PositionMode");
00235         }
00236 
00237         if ( TimeMode == "root" ){
00238                 //std::cout<<"PGA TM = root!"
00239                 //           <<", ("<<root_double[6]
00240                 //           <<") ns"
00241                 //           <<std::endl;
00242                 particleGun->SetParticleTime(root_double[6]*ns);
00243         }
00244         else if ( TimeMode != "none" ){
00245                 std::cout<<"ERROR: unknown TimeMode: "<<TimeMode<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00246                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries()",
00247                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00248                                 "unknown TimeMode");
00249         }
00250         particleGun->GeneratePrimaryVertex(anEvent);
00251 
00252 //      std::cout.precision(17);
00253 //      std::cout<<"\tDirection: "<<particleGun->GetParticleMomentumDirection()<<std::endl;
00254 //      std::cout<<"\tEnergy: "<<particleGun->GetParticleEnergy()/MeV<<" MeV"<<std::endl;
00255 //      std::cout.precision(3);
00256 //    CLHEP::HepRandom::showEngineStatus();
00257         if (!UseRoot) root_index++;
00258 }
00259 
00260 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformDirection(){
00261         G4double dir_x = 0., dir_y = 0., dir_z = 0.;
00262         G4bool dir_OK = false;
00263         while( !dir_OK ){
00264                 dir_x=G4UniformRand()-0.5;
00265                 dir_y=G4UniformRand()-0.5;
00266                 dir_z=G4UniformRand()-0.5;
00267                 if ( dir_x*dir_x + dir_y*dir_y + dir_z*dir_z <= 0.025 && dir_x*dir_x + dir_y*dir_y + dir_z*dir_z != 0) dir_OK = true;
00268         }
00269         G4ThreeVector dir_3Vec(dir_x, dir_y, dir_z);
00270         particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(dir_3Vec);
00271 }
00272 
00273 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetRandomEnergy(){
00274         if (EnergyType == 1){
00275                 G4double dE=0;
00276                 if(EnergyMode=="gRand"){
00277                         dE=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,EkinSpread);
00278                 }
00279                 else if(EnergyMode=="uRand"){
00280                         dE=(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*EkinSpread;
00281                 }
00282                 particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(Ekin+dE);
00283         }
00284         else if (EnergyType == 0 ){
00285                 G4double dMom=0;
00286                 if(EnergyMode=="gRand"){
00287                         dMom=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,MomSpread);
00288                 }
00289                 else if(EnergyMode=="uRand"){
00290                         dMom=(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*MomSpread;
00291                 }
00292                 G4double ekin = sqrt((Pa+dMom)*(Pa+dMom)+mass*mass)-mass;
00293                 particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(ekin);
00294         }
00295 }
00296 
00297 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetRandomDirection(){
00298         G4double dPhi=0;
00299         G4double dTheta=0;
00300         if(PhiMode=="gRand"){
00301                 if (PhiSpread) dPhi=G4RandGauss::shoot(Phi,PhiSpread);
00302         }
00303         else if (PhiMode=="uRand"){
00304                 if (PhiSpread) {dPhi=(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*PhiSpread;} 
00305         }
00306         if(ThetaMode=="gRand"){
00307                 if (ThetaSpread) dTheta=G4RandGauss::shoot(Theta,ThetaSpread);
00308         }
00309         else if (ThetaMode=="uRand"){
00310                 if (ThetaSpread) {dTheta=(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*ThetaSpread;} 
00311         }
00312         G4ThreeVector dir(1,1,1);
00313         dir.setTheta(Theta+dTheta);
00314         dir.setPhi(Phi+dPhi);
00315         G4RotationMatrix rot(Ephi,Etheta,Epsi);
00316         dir = rot*dir;
00317         particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(dir.unit());
00318 }
00319 
00320 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetRandomPosition(){
00321         G4double dx=0;
00322         G4double dy=0;
00323         G4double dz=0;
00324         G4double dx2=0;
00325         G4double dy2=0;
00326         G4double dz2=0;
00327         bool gotit=false;
00328         if(PositionMode=="gRand"){
00329                 do {
00330                         dx=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,xSpread);
00331                         dy=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,ySpread);
00332                         dz=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,zSpread);
00333                         if (dx2+dy2+dz2<=PosLimit2) gotit = true;
00334                 } while (!gotit);
00335         }
00336         else if (PositionMode=="sRand"){
00337                 do {
00338                         if (xSpread) {dx=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5);dx2 = dx*dx;dx*=xSpread;} 
00339                         if (ySpread) {dy=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5);dy2 = dy*dy;dy*=ySpread;} 
00340                         if (zSpread) {dz=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5);dz2 = dz*dz;dz*=zSpread;} 
00341                         if (dx2+dy2+dz2<=1.) gotit = true;
00342                 } while (!gotit);
00343         }
00344         else if (PositionMode=="bRand"){
00345                 if (xSpread) dx=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*xSpread;
00346                 if (ySpread) dy=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*ySpread;
00347                 if (zSpread) dz=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*zSpread;
00348         }
00349         else if (PositionMode=="source"){
00350           // Make sure that the random position chosen is within the Target volume
00351           G4Navigator* theNavigator = G4TransportationManager::GetTransportationManager()->GetNavigatorForTracking();
00352 
00353           // Get a random position based on the spread (copied code from gRand)
00354           do {
00355             dx=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,xSpread);
00356             dy=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,ySpread);
00357             dz=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,zSpread);
00358 
00359             G4ThreeVector position(x+dx, y+dy, z+dz);
00360             G4VPhysicalVolume* phys_volume = theNavigator->LocateGlobalPointAndSetup(position);
00361 
00362             if (!phys_volume) {
00363               continue; // if theNavigator didn't return a physical volume
00364             }
00365 
00366             if (phys_volume->GetName() == "Source") {
00367               gotit = true;
00368             }
00369           } while (!gotit);
00370         }
00371         else if (PositionMode=="target"){
00372           // Make sure that the random position chosen is within the Target volume
00373           G4Navigator* theNavigator = G4TransportationManager::GetTransportationManager()->GetNavigatorForTracking();
00374 
00375           // Get a random position based on the spread (copied code from gRand)
00376           do {
00377             dx=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,xSpread);
00378             dy=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,ySpread);
00379             dz=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,zSpread);
00380 
00381             G4ThreeVector position(x+dx, y+dy, z+dz);
00382             G4VPhysicalVolume* phys_volume = theNavigator->LocateGlobalPointAndSetup(position);
00383 
00384             if (!phys_volume) {
00385               continue; // if theNavigator didn't return a physical volume
00386             }
00387 
00388             if (phys_volume->GetName() == "Target") {
00389               gotit = true;
00390             }
00391           } while (!gotit);
00392         }
00393         particleGun->SetParticlePosition(G4ThreeVector(x+dx,y+dy,z+dz));
00394 }
00395 
00396 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition(){
00397         MyVGeometryParameter* pMyVGeometryParameter = MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->GetSvc(UP_SubDet)->get_GeometryParameter();
00398         if (!pMyVGeometryParameter){
00399                 std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition cannot find : "<<UP_SubDet<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00400                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00401                                 "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00402                                 "cannot ");
00403         }
00404         if ( UP_Type == "Simple" ){
00405                 SimpleGeometryParameter* pSimpleGeometryParameter = dynamic_cast<SimpleGeometryParameter*> (pMyVGeometryParameter);
00406                 if (!pSimpleGeometryParameter){
00407                         std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition cannot convert : "<<UP_SubDet<<" from MyVGeometryParameter to SimpleGeometryParameter!!!"<<std::endl;
00408                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00409                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00410                                         "cannot convert from MyVGeometryParameter to SimpleGeometryParameter");
00411                 }
00412                 int index = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_VolIndex(UP_Volume);
00413                 if ( index == -1 ){
00414                         std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition cannot find : "<<UP_Volume<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00415                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00416                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00417                                         "cannot convert volume");
00418                 }
00419                 G4String sol_type = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_SolidType(index);
00420                 G4ThreeVector pos(1,0,0);
00421                 G4int n = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_RepNo(index);
00422                 G4int ivol = G4UniformRand()*n;
00423                 if ( sol_type == "Tubs" ){
00424                         G4double RMax,RMin,length,StartPhi,SpanPhi;
00425                         G4int iTubs = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_SolidIndex(index);
00426                         RMax = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_RMax(iTubs,ivol);
00427                         RMin = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_RMin(iTubs,ivol);
00428                         length = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_Length(iTubs,ivol);
00429                         StartPhi = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_StartAng(iTubs,ivol);
00430                         SpanPhi = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_SpanAng(iTubs,ivol);
00431 
00432                         G4double iz, iphi, ir;
00433                         iz = G4UniformRand()*length -length/2;
00434                         iphi = G4UniformRand()*SpanPhi + StartPhi;
00435                         ir = G4UniformRand()*(RMax*RMax-RMin*RMin)+RMin*RMin;
00436                         ir = sqrt(ir);
00437                         pos.setPhi(iphi);
00438                         pos.setRho(ir);
00439                         pos.setZ(iz);
00440                 }
00441                 else{
00442                         std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition unsupported solid type: "<<sol_type<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00443                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00444                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00445                                         "unsupported solid type");
00446                 }
00447                 G4double xp,yp,zp;
00448                 xp = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosX(index,ivol);
00449                 yp = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosY(index,ivol);
00450                 zp = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosZ(index,ivol);
00451                 pos += G4ThreeVector(xp,yp,zp);
00452                 //>>>>
00453                 G4String mot_volume = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_MotherName(index);
00454                 SimpleGeometryParameter * pmotSimpleGeometryParameter = 0;
00455                 int temp_index = index;
00456                 int mot_index = -1;
00457                 while (mot_volume!="None"){
00458                         pmotSimpleGeometryParameter = MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->GetParaFromVolume(mot_volume);
00459                         int mot_index = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_VolIndex(mot_volume);
00460                         G4double mot_xp = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosX(mot_index);
00461                         G4double mot_yp = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosY(mot_index);
00462                         G4double mot_zp = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosZ(mot_index);
00463                         pos += G4ThreeVector(mot_xp,mot_yp,mot_zp);
00464                         temp_index = mot_index;
00465                         mot_volume = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_MotherName(temp_index);
00466                 }
00467                 //<<<<
00468                 particleGun->SetParticlePosition(pos);
00469         }
00470         else{
00471                 std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition unsopported parameter class type: "<<UP_Type<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00472                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00473                                 "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00474                                 "unsopported parameter class type");
00475         }
00476 }
00477 
00478 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile(){
00479         G4String dir_name = getenv("CONFIGUREDATAROOT");
00480         if (dir_name[dir_name.size()-1] != '/') dir_name.append("/");
00481 
00482         // EnergyMode
00483         if (EnergyMode=="histo"){
00484                 G4String full_infile_name = dir_name +  EM_hist_filename;
00485 //              if (fp) delete fp;
00486                 fp = new TFile(full_infile_name.c_str());
00487                 if (fp==NULL) {
00488                         std::cout<<"ERROR: Can not find file: "<<full_infile_name<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00489                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile()",
00490                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00491                                         "Can not find file");
00492                 }
00493                 TH1F* h = (TH1F*)fp->Get(EM_hist_histname.c_str());
00494                 if(h==NULL){
00495                         std::cout<<"ERROR: Can not find file: "<<full_infile_name<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00496                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile()",
00497                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00498                                         "Can not find file");
00499                 }
00500                 EM_hist = h;
00501         }
00502 
00503         // DirectionMode
00504         if (DirectionMode=="histo"){
00505                 G4String full_infile_name = dir_name +  DM_hist_filename;
00506                 if (fp) delete fp;
00507                 fp = new TFile(full_infile_name.c_str());
00508                 if (fp==NULL) {
00509                         std::cout<<"ERROR: Can not find file: "<<full_infile_name<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00510                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile()",
00511                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00512                                         "Can not find file");
00513                 }
00514                 TH1F* h = (TH1F*)fp->Get(DM_hist_histname.c_str());
00515                 if(h==NULL){
00516                         std::cout<<"ERROR: Can not find file: "<<full_infile_name<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00517                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile()",
00518                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00519                                         "Can not find file");
00520                 }
00521                 DM_hist = h;
00522         }
00523 }
00524 
00525 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_get_para(){
00526         int iEvent = (int) fmod(root_index,root_num);
00527         m_TChain->GetEntry(iEvent);
00528         root_index++;
00529 }
00530 
00531 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_build(){
00532         G4String dir_name = getenv("CONFIGUREDATAROOT");
00533         if (dir_name[dir_name.size()-1] != '/') dir_name.append("/");
00534         std::string m_TFile_name = dir_name + root_filename;
00535         //if (m_TChain) delete m_TChain;
00536         m_TChain = new TChain("t");
00537         m_TChain->Add(m_TFile_name.c_str());
00538         root_num = m_TChain->GetEntries();
00539         root_set_extra();
00540         if ( EnergyMode == "root" ){
00541                 UseRoot = true;
00542                 root_set_Energy();
00543         }
00544         if ( PositionMode == "root" ){
00545                 UseRoot = true;
00546                 root_set_Position();
00547         }
00548         if ( TimeMode == "root" ){
00549                 UseRoot = true;
00550                 root_set_Time();
00551         }
00552         if ( pidMode == "root" ){
00553                 UseRoot = true;
00554                 root_set_pid();
00555         }
00556         if ( RandMode == "root" ){
00557                 root_set_Rand();
00558         }
00559 }

00561 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_Position(){
00562         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("x", &root_double[0]);
00563         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("y", &root_double[1]);
00564         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("z", &root_double[2]);
00565 }
00566 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_Energy(){
00567         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("px", &root_double[3]);
00568         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("py", &root_double[4]);
00569         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("pz", &root_double[5]);
00570 }
00571 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_Time(){
00572         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("t", &root_double[6]);
00573 }
00574 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_pid(){
00575         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("pid", &root_int[0]);
00576 }
00577 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_Rand(){
00578 //      flag_R0 = m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("R0", &root_double[7]);
00579 //      flag_R1 = m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("R1", &root_double[8]);
00580         flag_R0 = m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("R0", &root_int[3]);
00581         flag_R1 = m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("R1", &root_int[4]);
00582 }
00583 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_extra(){
00584         flag_weight=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("weight", &root_double[9]);
00585         flag_ox=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ox", &root_double[10]);
00586         flag_oy=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("oy", &root_double[11]);
00587         flag_oz=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("oz", &root_double[12]);
00588         flag_opx=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("opx", &root_double[13]);
00589         flag_opy=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("opy", &root_double[14]);
00590         flag_opz=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("opz", &root_double[15]);
00591         flag_ot=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ot", &root_double[16]);
00592         flag_ipx=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ipx", &root_double[17]);
00593         flag_ipy=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ipy", &root_double[18]);
00594         flag_ipz=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ipz", &root_double[19]);
00595         flag_process=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("process",&root_str[0]);
00596         flag_volume=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("volume",&root_str[1]);
00597         flag_ppid=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ppid",&root_int[1]);
00598         flag_ptid=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ptid",&root_int[2]);
00599 }

00601 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::ResetGen(G4String file_name){
00602         ReadCard(file_name);
00603         Initialize();
00604 }
00605 
00606 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::ReadCard(G4String file_name){
00607         std::cout<<" -- PrimaryGeneratorAction: Reading from \""<<file_name<<"\""<<std::endl;
00608         Reset();
00609         if(file_name[0] != '/'){ // Relative Dir
00610                 G4String dir_name = getenv("CONFIGUREROOT");
00611                 if (dir_name[dir_name.size()-1] != '/') dir_name.append("/");
00612                 file_name = dir_name + file_name;
00613         }
00614         std::ifstream fin_card(file_name);
00615         if ( !fin_card ){
00616                 std::cout<<"generator file \""<<file_name<<"\" is not available!!!"<<std::endl;
00617                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00618                                 FatalException, "generator file is not available.");
00619         }
00620         std::stringstream buf_card;
00621         std::string s_card;
00622         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00623                 buf_card.str("");
00624                 buf_card.clear();
00625                 buf_card<<s_card;
00626                 const char* c = s_card.c_str();
00627                 int length = strlen(c);
00628                 int offset = 0;
00629                 for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00630                         if ( c[offset] != ' ' ) break;
00631                 }
00632                 if ( c[offset] == '#' ) continue;
00633                 else if ( c[offset] == '/' && c[offset+1] == '/' ) continue;
00634                 else if ( length - offset == 0 ) continue;
00635                 std::string keyword;
00636                 std::string temp;
00637                 buf_card>>keyword;
00638                 if ( keyword == "Type:" ){
00639                         buf_card>>fType;
00640                 }
00641                 else if ( keyword == "Particle:" ){
00642                         buf_card>>ParticleName;
00643                 }
00644                 else if ( keyword == "Z:" ){
00645                         buf_card>>Z;
00646                 }
00647                 else if ( keyword == "A:" ){
00648                         buf_card>>A;
00649                 }
00650                 else if ( keyword == "C:" ){
00651                         buf_card>>C;
00652                 }
00653                 else if ( keyword == "E:" ){
00654                         buf_card>>E;
00655                 }
00656                 else if ( keyword == "Direction:" ){
00657                         buf_card>>temp;
00658                         Theta = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00659                         buf_card>>temp;
00660                         Phi = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00661                 }
00662                 else if ( keyword == "PhiSpread:" ){
00663                         buf_card>>temp;
00664                         PhiSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00665                 }
00666                 else if ( keyword == "Ephi:" ){
00667                         buf_card>>temp;
00668                         Ephi = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00669                 }
00670                 else if ( keyword == "Etheta:" ){
00671                         buf_card>>temp;
00672                         Etheta = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00673                 }
00674                 else if ( keyword == "Epsi:" ){
00675                         buf_card>>temp;
00676                         Epsi = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00677                 }
00678                 else if ( keyword == "ThetaSpread:" ){
00679                         buf_card>>temp;
00680                         ThetaSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00681                 }
00682                 else if ( keyword == "MomAmp:" ){
00683                         buf_card>>temp;
00684                         Pa = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*MeV;
00685                         EnergyType = 0;
00686                 }
00687                 else if ( keyword == "MomSpread:" ){
00688                         buf_card>>temp;
00689                         MomSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*MeV;
00690                 }
00691                 else if ( keyword == "Ekin:" ){
00692                         buf_card>>temp;
00693                         Ekin = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*MeV;
00694                         EnergyType = 1;
00695                 }
00696                 else if ( keyword == "EkinSpread:" ){
00697                         buf_card>>temp;
00698                         EkinSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*MeV;
00699                 }
00700                 else if ( keyword == "Position:" ){
00701                         buf_card>>temp;
00702                         x = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00703                         buf_card>>temp;
00704                         y = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00705                         buf_card>>temp;
00706                         z = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00707                 }
00708                 else if ( keyword == "PosSpread:" ){
00709                         buf_card>>temp;
00710                         xSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00711                         buf_card>>temp;
00712                         ySpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00713                         buf_card>>temp;
00714                         zSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00715                 }
00716                 else if ( keyword == "PosLimit:" ){
00717                         buf_card>>temp;
00718                         PosLimit2 = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00719                         PosLimit2 *= PosLimit2;
00720                 }
00721                 else if ( keyword == "Time:" ){
00722                         buf_card>>temp;
00723                         t = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*ns;
00724                 }
00725                 else if ( keyword == "RandMode:" ){
00726                         buf_card>>RandMode;
00727                 }
00728                 else if ( keyword == "EnergyMode:" ){
00729                         buf_card>>EnergyMode;
00730                 }
00731                 else if ( keyword == "PositionMode:" ){
00732                         buf_card>>PositionMode;
00733                 }
00734                 else if ( keyword == "TimeMode:" ){
00735                         buf_card>>TimeMode;
00736                 }
00737                 else if ( keyword == "pidMode:" ){
00738                         buf_card>>pidMode;
00739                 }
00740                 else if ( keyword == "DirectionMode:" ){
00741                         buf_card>>DirectionMode;
00742                 }
00743                 else if ( keyword == "ThetaMode:" ){
00744                         buf_card>>ThetaMode;
00745                 }
00746                 else if ( keyword == "PhiMode:" ){
00747                         buf_card>>PhiMode;
00748                 }
00749                 else if ( keyword == "EMHFN:" ){
00750                         buf_card>>EM_hist_filename;
00751                 }
00752                 else if ( keyword == "EMHHN:" ){
00753                         buf_card>>EM_hist_histname;
00754                 }
00755                 else if ( keyword == "DMHFN:" ){
00756                         buf_card>>DM_hist_filename;
00757                 }
00758                 else if ( keyword == "DMHHN:" ){
00759                         buf_card>>DM_hist_histname;
00760                 }
00761                 else if ( keyword == "RFN:" ){
00762                         buf_card>>root_filename;
00763                 }
00764                 else if ( keyword == "RTN:" ){
00765                         buf_card>>root_treename;
00766                 }
00767                 else if ( keyword == "UIV:" ){
00768                         buf_card>>UP_Type>>UP_SubDet>>UP_Volume;
00769                 }
00770                 else if ( keyword == "DEFINE:" ){
00771                         G4String MacroName;
00772                         G4String MacroValue;
00773                         buf_card>>MacroName>>MacroValue;
00774 //                      std::cout<<"found DEFINE:"<<std::endl; // to be deleted
00775                         MacroValue = ReplaceMacro(MacroValue);
00776                         bool foundName = false;
00777                         for (int i = 0; i < knownValueNames.size(); i++){
00778                                 if (knownValueNames[i]==MacroName){ // If this name occurred once, replace the value
00779                                         foundName = true;
00780                                         knownValues[i]=MacroValue;
00781                                         break;
00782                                 }
00783                         }
00784                         if (!foundName){
00785                                 knownValueNames.push_back(MacroName);
00786                                 knownValues.push_back(MacroValue);
00787                         }
00788                 }
00789                 else{
00790                         std::cout<<"In PrimaryGeneratorAction::ReadCard, unknown name: "<<keyword<<" in file "<<file_name<<std::endl;
00791                         std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00792                 }
00793         }
00794         fin_card.close();
00795         buf_card.str("");
00796         buf_card.clear();
00797         Dump();
00798 }
00799 
00800 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::Reset(){
00801         fType = "simple";
00802         RandMode = "none";
00803         EnergyMode = "none";
00804         PositionMode = "none";
00805         TimeMode = "none";
00806         pidMode = "none";
00807         DirectionMode = "none";
00808         PhiMode = "none";
00809         ThetaMode = "none";
00810         ParticleName = "chargedgeantino";
00811         EM_hist_filename = "";
00812         EM_hist_histname = "";
00813         DM_hist_filename = "";
00814         DM_hist_histname = "";
00815         root_filename = "";
00816         root_treename = "";
00817         UP_SubDet = "";
00818         UP_Volume = "";
00819         UP_Type = "";
00820         EnergyType = 1;
00821         Z = 1;
00822         A = 1;
00823         C = 0;
00824         E = 0;
00825         Pa = 0;
00826         Ekin = 0;
00827         mass = 0;
00828         Px = 0;
00829         Py = 0;
00830         Pz = 0;
00831         Theta = 0;
00832         Phi = 0;
00833         x = 0;
00834         y = 0;
00835         z = 0;
00836         t = 0;
00837         xSpread = 0;
00838         ySpread = 0;
00839         zSpread = 0;
00840         PosLimit2 = 0;
00841         MomSpread = 0;
00842         EkinSpread = 0;
00843         ThetaSpread = 0;
00844         PhiSpread = 0;
00845         Ephi = 0;
00846         Etheta = 0;
00847         Epsi = 0;
00848         EM_hist = 0;
00849         DM_hist = 0;
00850         root_num = 0;
00851         root_index = 0;
00852         UseRoot = false;
00853         flag_weight = false;
00854         flag_ox = false;
00855         flag_oy = false;
00856         flag_oz = false;
00857         flag_opx = false;
00858         flag_opy = false;
00859         flag_opz = false;
00860         flag_ipx = false;
00861         flag_ipy = false;
00862         flag_ipz = false;
00863         flag_ot = false;
00864         flag_process = false;
00865         flag_volume = false;
00866         flag_R0 = false;
00867         flag_R1 = false;
00868         flag_ppid = false;
00869         flag_ptid = false;
00870 }
00871 
00872 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::Initialize(){
00873         if (fType == "simple" || fType == "stable" || fType == "ion" ){
00874                 G4int n_particle = 1;
00875                 if (particleGun) delete particleGun;
00876                 particleGun  = new G4ParticleGun(n_particle);
00877         }
00878         else {
00879                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00880                                 FatalException, "unknown generator type.");
00881         }
00882 
00883         G4ParticleTable* particleTable = G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable();
00884         G4ParticleDefinition* particle = particleTable->FindParticle(ParticleName);
00885         if (!particle){
00886                 std::cout<<"ERROR: In PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction() Cannot find particle "<<ParticleName<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00887                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00888                                 FatalException, "Cannot find particle.");
00889         }
00890         if (fType == "stable"){
00891                 particle->SetPDGStable(true);
00892         }
00893         particleGun->SetParticleDefinition(particle);
00894         mass = particleGun->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGMass();
00895         G4ThreeVector dir(1,0,0);
00896         dir.setTheta(Theta);
00897         dir.setPhi(Phi);
00898         particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(dir.unit());
00899         if (EnergyType==0){
00900                 Ekin = sqrt(Pa*Pa+mass*mass)-mass;
00901         }
00902         particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(Ekin);
00903         particleGun->SetParticlePosition(G4ThreeVector(x,y,z));
00904         particleGun->SetParticleTime(t);
00905 
00906         if (EnergyMode == "histo" || DirectionMode == "histo" ){
00907                 BuildHistoFromFile();
00908         }
00909         UseRoot = false;
00910         if ( EnergyMode == "root" || PositionMode == "root" || TimeMode == "root" || pidMode == "root" || RandMode == "root"){
00911                 UseRoot = true;
00912                 root_build();
00913         }
00914         root_double[9]=1; // weight
00915         root_double[10]=-1;
00916         root_double[11]=-1;
00917         root_double[12]=-1;
00918         root_double[13]=-1;
00919         root_double[14]=-1;
00920         root_double[15]=-1;
00921         root_double[16]=-1;
00922         root_str[0]=0;
00923         root_str[1]=0;
00924         root_int[1]=-1;
00925         root_int[2]=-1;
00926 }
00927 
00928 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::Dump(){
00929         std::cout<<"---------------PrimaryGeneratorAction---------------------"<<std::endl;
00930         std::cout<<"Type:                                         "<<fType<<std::endl;
00931         if (fType=="ion"){
00932         std::cout<<"Z:                                            "<<Z<<std::endl;
00933         std::cout<<"A:                                            "<<A<<std::endl;
00934         std::cout<<"C:                                            "<<C<<std::endl;
00935         std::cout<<"E:                                            "<<E<<std::endl;
00936         }
00937         else{
00938         std::cout<<"Particle:                                     "<<ParticleName<<std::endl;
00939         }
00940         std::cout<<"Default Momentum Direction: theta =           "<<Theta/deg<<"deg, phi = "<<Phi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00941         std::cout<<"Default Phi Spread:                           "<<PhiSpread/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00942         std::cout<<"Default Ephi Spread:                          "<<Ephi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00943         std::cout<<"Default Etheta Spread:                        "<<Etheta/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00944         std::cout<<"Default Epsi Spread:                          "<<Epsi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00945         std::cout<<"Default Theta Spread:                         "<<ThetaSpread/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00946         if (EnergyType==0){
00947         std::cout<<"Default Momentum Amplitude:                   "<<Pa/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00948         std::cout<<"Default Momentum Spread(MeV/c):               ("<<MomSpread/MeV<<std::endl;
00949         }
00950         else if (EnergyType==1){
00951         std::cout<<"Default Kinetic Energy:                       "<<Ekin/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00952         std::cout<<"Default Energy Spread(MeV):                   ("<<EkinSpread/MeV<<std::endl;
00953         }
00954         std::cout<<"Default Position(mm):                         ("<<x/mm<<", "<<y/mm<<", "<<z/mm<<")"<<std::endl;
00955         std::cout<<"Default Position Spread(mm):                  ("<<xSpread/mm<<", "<<ySpread/mm<<", "<<zSpread/mm<<")"<<std::endl;
00956         std::cout<<"Default Position Limit(mm):                   ("<<sqrt(PosLimit2)/mm<<std::endl;
00957         std::cout<<"Default Time(ns):                             ("<<t/ns<<std::endl;
00958         std::cout<<"EnergyMode:                                   "<<EnergyMode<<std::endl;
00959         std::cout<<"PositionMode:                                 "<<PositionMode<<std::endl;
00960         std::cout<<"TimeMode:                                     "<<TimeMode<<std::endl;
00961         std::cout<<"pidMode:                                      "<<pidMode<<std::endl;
00962         std::cout<<"Uniform In sub-detector:                      "<<UP_SubDet<<std::endl;
00963         std::cout<<"  Volume:                                     "<<UP_Volume<<std::endl;
00964         std::cout<<"  Type:                                       "<<UP_Type<<std::endl;
00965         std::cout<<"DirectionMode:                                "<<DirectionMode<<std::endl;
00966         std::cout<<"PhiMode:                                      "<<PhiMode<<std::endl;
00967         std::cout<<"ThetaMode:                                    "<<ThetaMode<<std::endl;
00968         std::cout<<"File Name for EnergyMode = histo:             "<<EM_hist_filename<<std::endl;
00969         std::cout<<"Histogram Name for EnergyMode = histo:        "<<EM_hist_histname<<std::endl;
00970         std::cout<<"File Name for DirectionMode = histo:          "<<DM_hist_filename<<std::endl;
00971         std::cout<<"Histogram Name for DirectionMode = histo:     "<<DM_hist_histname<<std::endl;
00972         std::cout<<"File Name for Energy/Position/TimeMode = root: "<<root_filename<<std::endl;
00973         std::cout<<"Tree Name for Energy/Position/TimeMode = root: "<<root_treename<<std::endl;
00974         std::cout<<"---------------------------------------------------------"<<std::endl;
00975 }
